description: Returns the list of optimizations that Auto-Tune has made to an Amazon OpenSearch Service domain. For more information, see Auto-Tune for Amazon OpenSearch Service.

parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description: Name of the domain that you want Auto-Tune details about.

nested_items.name: AutoTunes
nested_items.description: The list of setting adjustments that Auto-Tune has made to the domain.

nested_items.name: ScheduledAutoTuneDetails
nested_items.description: Container for details about a scheduled Auto-Tune action.

nested_items.name: Date
nested_items.description: The date and time when the Auto-Tune action is scheduled for the domain.

nested_items.name: Action
nested_items.description: A description of the Auto-Tune action.

nested_items.name: Severity
nested_items.description: The severity of the Auto-Tune action. Valid values are LOW, MEDIUM, and HIGH.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: When nextToken is returned, there are more results available. The value of nextToken is a unique pagination token for each page. Send the request again using the returned token to retrieve the next page.
